thread.title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott congratulates Houston Astros for advancing to ALCS; Rangers end up losing
thread.title_full: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott congratulates Houston Astros for advancing to ALCS; Rangers end up losing

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott congratulates Houston Astros for advancing to ALCS; Rangers end up losing
text:
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott congratulates Houston Astros for advancing to ALCS; Rangers end up losing greg abbott.jpg Comments 
The Houston Astros had their ALDS series against the Kansas City Royals in the palm of their hand. They needed one win to advance, and held a 6-2 lead after seven innings and a solid bullpen coming in to clean it up. 
However, the lead was far from insurmountable. The Royals tacked on five runs in the eighth inning, and another two in the ninth en route to a 9-6 win to force a winner-take-all Game 5 back in Kansas City. 
The champagne remains unpopped in Arlington. However, there were some premature celebrations that can't be taken back. Queue Texas Governor Greg Abbott's Twitter account: Congrats to Texas on finding a governor even dumber than Rick Perry. pic.twitter.com/2FZjbjMIez
